venue.address_2: Rte 16, One mile north of Mt Wash Auto Road
venue.name: Nineteen Mile Brook Trailhead

item.description:
A big hike with big views, we will take it at a slightly slower pace with more stops to catch our breath.

hike up 19 mile Brook trail, take the Carter Dome Trail to Zeta Pass, ascend the 4675' Mt Hight with its bare rock summit, affords incredible views, the best in the entire Cartier-Moriah Range!

The trails have great footing and easy grades almost all the time. After a good rest, water, and snacks we'll ascend Carter Dome 4832'.

If our group wishes, we can either retrace our footprints and return via the Carter Dome trail or descend into the stunning Carter Notch with magnificent views and see the Carter Lakes and visit the Carter Notch Hut for a hot beverage (that you supply using their full kitchen facilities).

It is then a easy 4.0 mile downhill walk back to the trailhead.


Where:Nineteen Mile Trailhead, Gorham , NH 03581

 

Length:10.2 total miles

Elevation Gain:3,600 feet

Read more at Trails.com: Carter Dome - Mount Hight Loop Trail | Gorham New Hampshire Hikes | Trails.com http://www.trails.com/tcatalog_trail.aspx?trailId=HGN202-013#ixzz22umic95c

 

Trail map can be found ***HERE***

 

MAKE SURE YOU PACK YOUR HEADLAMP AND EXTRA BATTERIES.  ANY DELAYS AND WE COULD FINISH THE HIKE AFTER SUNDOWN

 

For those of us that are less fit, hiking is fantastic conditioning, but that stress level is hit much faster so replacement drinks are advised. Nuun, Powerade Zero, and Gatorade all make a good sugar free version for those who are controlling their sugar.



Click for weather forecast

 

ALL CANCELLATIONS OR CHANGES TO RSVP'S SHOULD BE MADE BY 6 PM THE NIGHT BEFORE THE HIKE. We rely of the RSVP's to get a true headcount and the hikers rely on the leaders to communicate.
item.how_to_find_us: We encourage carpooling or 8:30 am nineteen mile trailhead-$3Fee area. phone/text 603-477-5116 so we have real plans to meet you for the meetup, and no question of if your in the right location.
item.name: Carter Dome and Mt Hight! CasualMX pace
